extendedInfo.description: Your baby cries a lot? Can you put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel. Choose the music and the time and put your child to sleep, a beautiful song That will really calm your baby.Lullabies are sung by mothers around the world for Their children fall asleep.â You can choose the music.â You can choose the time.â Great quality of the soundâ Absolutely Relaxing!â The best relaxing sound!The lullaby is a soothing song, usually sung to young children before They go to sleep, with the intention of speeding That process.

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.comment: I tried both this app and also the second one \"Lullabies for babies 2\" their great apps! My two month old baby loves it she falls right to sleep when she hears these lullabies! :) <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works well for my daughter
reviews.comment: Simple to use, and rather too relaxing at times ;-] I think the first track is the best one. Though you may feel different.
reviews.author: Paul Doig

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: My baby loves it! It helps him go to sleep when he can\'t be in his own bed! I love it, I can set the timer and it won\'t kill my battery!
reviews.author: Stacie Hyland

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: This kinda sucks my baby wakes up everytime the music stops I\'ll put the timer for an hour and it turns off after about 5mins Ugh
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just saved what sanity I may have left.
reviews.comment: I downloaded after EVERYTHING I had done to get my 1 month old to sleep had failed. She had been up & crying four 5 hours. I went straight to music, the first song for 30 minutes & she was out in the first 5 minutes. It\'s still play now as I type this, I\'m scared to turn it off!
reviews.author: Serra Brindley

reviews.title: Does the job but keep stopping when wi-fi is on
reviews.comment: It does exactly what it says: Plays lullabies. But it keeps stopping when my wi-fi is turned on... That really bothers me, hence the 4 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So good!!
reviews.comment: It\'s amazing.My little sister enjoys it and  it relaxes her mind.Plz add more songs.I love the 3 song?
reviews.author: Carol Wambui

reviews.title: Big sis
reviews.comment: Very good put my baby bro straight to sleep. Very happy. I find music 1 the best, my brother loves it, he is always sleeping. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great to put the asleep
reviews.comment: Simple and basic.  App doesn\'t always stay running in the background. As most devices can do multi tasking
reviews.author: A.J Nguyen

reviews.comment:
Excellent, . ! 
My Beautiful Baby Boy Falls Straight To Sleep((: 

#Recemend
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It\'s great for on the road to help your baby clam down my son just falls right to sleep
reviews.author: Ceira Kolander

reviews.title: Whoa!
reviews.comment: My baby went to sleep within 5 mins after using this the first time. He seems to like the music 2 lullaby. Amazed by this!
reviews.author: Heather Friend

reviews.title: Super excellent
reviews.comment: It works really good my baby fall asleep when she hears \357\273\277the songs...;)
reviews.author: Sendy Santos

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Ads pop up when I try to shut it off. Wont let me
reviews.author: Tinet Botha

reviews.title: Freaking awesome
reviews.comment: I love thus lullaby!particularly 2. I honestly feel my 6mo old son is at ease while he sleeps when i leave this to play!i love tht i can put a timer on it.i think there\'s singing wrong with it tho theres times where id turn my screen on n its tiger shouldn\'t go odf n does tht ahold b fixed because other than that its great! Thank u guys:) it even puts me to sleep lol
reviews.author: Jolene Rodriguez

reviews.title: Not only for babies...
reviews.comment: Calming musics.... not only my baby fell asleep i did too... :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: It works every single time. I play it when ever baby is fussy and before u know it, he\'s in his own world until he falls asleep.
reviews.author: Ruchelle Brown

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Works great I use it mostly when he is sick or restless falls right to sleep...... Love this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tired New mom
reviews.comment: Thought this would help me get more sleep, no...downloads adds to phone all night. How stupid!
reviews.author: C McB

reviews.title: BAD
reviews.comment: Dislike! This app never works! Music stops after one minute always!!
reviews.author: Ana Marron
